title: Calendar Girls
description: Haley Fitzpatrick lives her life vicariously. Whether it be her beloved literature, Netflix queue or through the exploits of her best friend, bookish Haley had resigned herself to being a bystander in her own life.Until Bennet.Handsome and charming, he was the living embodiment of all the heroes she’d grown up reading about… and he wanted her. Finally, Haley was living the life she’d always dreamt of. Until she wasn’t.When the bodies of missing women start to pile up, Haley is left reeling as her almost picture perfect world starts to crumble around her. Trigger Warnings: All of them.This story is rated Pitch Black and is not intended for anyone under the age of eighteen. Due to its graphic nature including scenes of extreme brutality, violence and sexual content, it is not recommended for the faint of heart.
author: Nadia Michelle
